content: There are many small wells that dot the Yellow Sand Ridge area, but the one you need to seek out is located back in Sandgate Village. Head back to the area where you fought the Earth Wolf and **rescued the Horse Guai** who was tied up by the large statue.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Rattle-Drum_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Old Rattle-Drum Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Third Location - Sandgate Village'.
The content is as follows:
There are many small wells that dot the Yellow Sand Ridge area, but the one you need to seek out is located back in Sandgate Village. Head back to the area where you fought the Earth Wolf and **rescued the Horse Guai** who was tied up by the large statue.
